name: Buccaneer's Breastplate
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Magic Items/Armor/Specific Armors/Buccaneers Breastplate

Construction.Requirements: Craft Magic Arms and Armor, water walk

sections.body: This +1 breastplate is made of bluish metal and decorated with wave motifs. It allows the wearer to continually utilize the effects of the spell water walk. If a creature puts on the armor while underwater, the wearer is borne toward the surface at a rate of 60 feet per round.
sections.name: Description
